basics.summary: I am a full stacking web developer who loves working with open source technology. I work best in planning the architecture of web applications and their development life. I also love to get the community involved and have had much experience with building and organizing large open source groups.

references.reference: i worked with richard at, where he was a valuable member a team member who worked on a 3 week data entry project and, later, when i was superintendent of schools in simi valley usd, i had his company consult for district and saved my district nearly 2 million., we first hired Joshua as an ios developer. he soon got promoted to head of the mobile development team as he has proven himself to be a team leader, he was able to evaluate and identify the best development strategies, most suitable frameworks, apis, and technologies for our projects, he could communicate the company technology strategy to, customers, partners etc., he would review the current best practices for the selected frameworks, he would conduct code reviews and tests.
